entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `agentId` TEXT NOT NULL, `content` TEXT NOT NULL, `source` TEXT NOT NULL, `importance` REAL NOT NULL, `hash` TEXT NOT NULL, `createdAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `updatedAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `accessedAt` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `accessCount` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

indices.name: index_memory_entries_agentId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_memory_entries_agentId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`agentId`)

indices.name: index_memory_entries_source
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_memory_entries_source` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`source`)

indices.name: index_memory_entries_hash
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_memory_entries_hash` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`hash`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`rowId` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `chunkUuid` TEXT NOT NULL, `memoryId` TEXT NOT NULL, `text` TEXT NOT NULL, `startOffset` INTEGER NOT NULL, `endOffset` INTEGER NOT NULL, `hash` TEXT NOT NULL, `embeddingModel` TEXT, `embedding` BLOB, `updatedAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`memoryId`) REFERENCES `memory_entries`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_memory_chunks_memoryId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_memory_chunks_memoryId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`memoryId`)

indices.name: index_memory_chunks_chunkUuid
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_memory_chunks_chunkUuid` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`chunkUuid`)

indices.name: index_memory_chunks_hash
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_memory_chunks_hash` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`hash`)

entities.createSql: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` USING FTS4(`text` TEXT NOT NULL, content=`memory_chunks`)
contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_memory_chunks_fts_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `memory_chunks` BEGIN DELETE FROM `memory_chunks_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_memory_chunks_fts_BEFORE_DELETE BEFORE DELETE ON `memory_chunks` BEGIN DELETE FROM `memory_chunks_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_memory_chunks_fts_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `memory_chunks` BEGIN INSERT INTO `memory_chunks_fts`(`docid`, `text`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`text`); END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_memory_chunks_fts_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `memory_chunks` BEGIN INSERT INTO `memory_chunks_fts`(`docid`, `text`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`text`); END

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_memory_tags_name
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_memory_tags_name` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`name`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`memoryId` TEXT NOT NULL, `tagId` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`memoryId`, `tagId`), FOREIGN KEY(`memoryId`) REFERENCES `memory_entries`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE , FOREIGN KEY(`tagId`) REFERENCES `memory_tags`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_memory_entry_tags_tagId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_memory_entry_tags_tagId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`tagId`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`key` TEXT NOT NULL, `value` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`key`))

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO room_master_table (id,identity_hash) VALUES(42, 'd543591038ff8a6b34c6e2e0d2d895d5')
